title: Patriots, Browns, trade deadline, NFL stats, and the Herd hierarchy
itunes:title: Patriots, Browns, trade deadline, NFL stats, and the Herd hierarchy
description:
Colin discusses the legacy of the New England Patriots, why the NFL is so difficult, what probably got former Cleveland Browns HC Hue Jackson fired, NFL stats that are improving, the trade deadline, and the Herd hierarchy. Guests include Chris Broussard, Dustin Fox, Albert Breer, and Tony Gonzalez.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
